amendment.description: An amendment numbered 80 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funding for Executive Order 14057: Catalyzing Clean Energy Industries and Jobs Through Federal Sustainability.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burlison amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Burlison amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Burlison amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
